title: OpenCTI Installation on Google Cloud Platform
snippet: PrerequisitesSystem Requirement: 	OS : Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (x86/64, amd64)	Disk Size: 30 GB     # recommended more size as per your requirement 	memory: 16 GB	core: 4 vcpu (1 shared core)	Networking: ...
content: PrerequisitesSystem Requirement: 	OS : Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (x86/64, amd64)	Disk Size: 30 GB     # recommended more size as per your requirement 	memory: 16 GB	core: 4 vcpu (1 shared core)	Networking: 		Allow port 80 # http traffic		Allow port 8080		Allow port 443 # https traffic
